channel.title: Dashboard on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Dashboard on Konigi

item.title: Arrivals, Cultured Code Development Status
item.description:
I love this idea. Cultured Code shows the development status on their projects as a flight arrivals display.
http://culturedcode.com/status/

item.title: The Panic Status Board
item.description: Panic got inspiration from Cultured Code’s Development Status Board and crafted their own dashboard/status board, displayed in a flat screen TV. Via @balsamiqMarco http://www.panic.com/blog/2010/03/the-panic-status-board/
